Instance.description: A template class for creating households to be placed into the neighborhood.

TunableList.name: _household_members
TunableList.description: A list of sim templates that will make up the sims in this household.

Tunable.name: chance
Tunable.description: The chance that this household member is created when the household is created. This is useful for 'optional' Sims. For example, you might want to tune a third of typical nuclear families to own a dog, should the resource be available.

TunableEnum.name: household_member_tag
TunableEnum.description: Tag to be used to create relationship between sim members. This does NOT have to be unique for all household templates. If you want to add more tags in the tag tuning just add with prefix of household_member.r.

Tunable.name: sim_template
Tunable.description: A template to use for creating a household member. If this references a resource that is not installed, the household member is ignored and the family is going to be created without this individual.

TunableList.name: _household_relationship
TunableList.description: Matrix of relationship that should be applied to household members.

TunableEnum.name: family_relationship
TunableEnum.description: This is the family relationship between x and y. Example: if set to Father, x is the the father of y.

Tunable.name: is_parentless_sibling
Tunable.description: Sibling relationship is automatically identified if x and y share a parent. If there is no parent in this household, checking this will establish their sibling relationship. At the moment, no additional family relationships are supported on these Sims. For example, these Sims cannot have an actual parent nor any children/grandchildren. If you require this functionality, please talk to a GPE.

Tunable.name: is_spouse
Tunable.description: Check if x and y are spouses.

TunableList.name: relationship_bits
TunableList.description: Relationship bits that should be applied to x with the target y. Any bits with a relationship track will add relationship track at value that will add the bit to both sims. Any bits without Triggered track will only be applied only to x unless it is a Siginificant other Bit. Example: If friendship-friend bit is supplied which has a triggered track of LTR_Friendship_Main, then LTR_Frienship_main will be added to both sims with a random value of the min/max value of the bit data tuning that will supply bit.

TunableEnum.name: x
TunableEnum.description: Tag of the household member to apply relationship to.

TunableEnum.name: y
TunableEnum.description: Tag of the household member to be the target of relationship.

Tunable.name: desired_rent_multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier that this household's desired rent will be modified by.
